verses.verse: Better <WH2896> is the poor <WH7326> that walketh <WH1980> in his integrity <WH8537> Than he that is perverse <WH6141> in his lips <WH8193> and is a fool <WH3684>.
Also <WH5315>, that the soul be without knowledge <WH1847> is not good <WH2896>; And he that hasteth <WH213> with his feet <WH7272> sinneth <WH2398>.
The foolishness <WH200> of man <WH120> subverteth <WH5557> his way <WH1870>; And his heart <WH3820> fretteth <WH2196> against Jehovah <WH3068>.
Wealth <WH1952> addeth <WH3254> many <WH7227> friends <WH7453>; But the poor <WH1800> is separated <WH6504> from his friend <WH7453>.
A false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> shall not be unpunished <WH5352>; And he that uttereth <WH6315> lies <WH3577> shall not escape <WH4422>.
Many <WH7227> will entreat <WH2470> the favor <WH6440> of the liberal <WH5081> man <WH7453>; And every man is a friend to him <WH376> that giveth gifts <WH4976>.
All the brethren <WH251> of the poor <WH7326> do hate <WH8130> him <WH4828>: How much more do his friends go far <WH7368> from him <WH7291>! He pursueth them with words <WH561>, but they are gone.
He that getteth <WH7069> wisdom <WH3820> loveth <WH157> his own soul <WH5315>: He that keepeth <WH8104> understanding <WH8394> shall find <WH4672> good <WH2896>.
A false <WH8267> witness <WH5707> shall not be unpunished <WH5352>; And he that uttereth <WH6315> lies <WH3577> shall perish <WH6>.
Delicate <WH8588> living is not seemly <WH5000> for a fool <WH3684>; Much less for a servant <WH5650> to have rule <WH4910> over princes <WH8269>.
The discretion <WH7922> of a man <WH120> maketh him slow <WH748> to anger <WH639>; And it is his glory <WH8597> to pass over <WH5674> a transgression <WH6588>.
The king <WH4428>'s wrath <WH2197> is as the roaring <WH5099> of a lion <WH3715>; But his favor <WH7522> is as dew <WH2919> upon the grass <WH6212>.
A foolish <WH3684> son <WH1121> is the calamity <WH1942> of his father <WH1>; And the contentions <WH4079> of a wife <WH802> are a continual <WH2956> dropping <WH1812>.
House <WH1004> and riches <WH1952> are an inheritance <WH5159> from fathers <WH1>; But a prudent <WH7919> wife <WH802> is from Jehovah <WH3068>.
Slothfulness <WH6103> casteth <WH5307> into a deep sleep <WH8639>; And the idle <WH7423> soul <WH5315> shall suffer hunger <WH7456>.
He that keepeth <WH8104> the commandment <WH4687> keepeth <WH8104> his soul <WH5315>; But he that is careless <WH959> of his ways <WH1870> shall die <WH4191>.
He that hath pity <WH2603> upon the poor <WH1800> lendeth <WH3867> unto Jehovah <WH3068>, And his good deed <WH1576> will he pay him again <WH7999>.
Chasten <WH3256> thy son <WH1121>, seeing there is <WH3426> hope <WH8615>; And set not thy <WH5315> heart <WH5375> on his destruction <WH4191>.
A man <WH1419> of great <WH1632> wrath <WH2534> shall bear <WH5375> the penalty <WH6066>; For if thou deliver <WH5337> him <WH3254>, thou must do it yet again.
Hear <WH8085> counsel <WH6098>, and receive <WH6901> instruction <WH4148>, That thou mayest be wise <WH2449> in thy latter end <WH319>.
There are many <WH7227> devices <WH4284> in a man <WH376>'s heart <WH3820>; But the counsel <WH6098> of Jehovah <WH3068>, that shall stand <WH6965>.
That which maketh a man <WH120> to be desired <WH8378> is his kindness <WH2617>; And a poor man <WH7326> is better <WH2896> than <WH376> a liar <WH3577>.
The fear <WH3374> of Jehovah <WH3068> tendeth to life <WH2416>; And he that hath it shall abide <WH3885> satisfied <WH7649>; He shall not be visited <WH6485> with evil <WH7451>.
The sluggard <WH6102> burieth <WH2934> his hand <WH3027> in the dish <WH6747>, And will not so much as bring <WH7725> it to his mouth <WH6310> again <WH7725>.
Smite <WH5221> a scoffer <WH3887>, and the simple <WH6612> will learn prudence <WH6191>; And reprove <WH3198> one that hath understanding <WH995>, and he will understand <WH995> knowledge <WH1847>.
He that doeth <WH7703> violence to his father <WH1>, and chaseth away <WH1272> his mother <WH517>, Is a son <WH1121> that causeth shame <WH954> and bringeth reproach <WH2659>.
Cease <WH2308>, my son <WH1121>, to hear <WH8085> instruction <WH4148> Only to err <WH7686> from the words <WH561> of knowledge <WH1847>.
A worthless <WH1100> witness <WH5707> mocketh <WH3887> at justice <WH4941>; And the mouth <WH6310> of the wicked <WH7563> swalloweth <WH1104> iniquity <WH7563>.
Judgments <WH8201> are prepared <WH3559> for scoffers <WH3887>, And stripes <WH4112> for the back <WH1460> of fools <WH3684>.
